snippet: Portugal’s Constitutional Court ruled that some pay cuts in this year’s state budget were unlawful, denying the government about $1.8 billion of predicted revenue.
abstract: Portugal’s Constitutional Court rules that some pay cuts in 2013 state budget are unlawful, denying government about $1.8 billion of predicted revenue.
lead_paragraph: Portugal’s Constitutional Court ruled that some pay cuts in this year’s state budget were unlawful, denying the government about $1.8 billion of predicted revenue.
